short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change georgian letters to latin letters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically converts in the website letters of the Georgian alphabet to the corresponding letters of the Latin alphabet.

Addon is written to facilitate the study of Georgian language for people who have problems with reading Georgian letters quickly.

Works only on pages with the .ge domain.

Tested on:
on.ge
ambebi.ge
tabula.ge

Issues or suggestions? Write to: juszczykjakub@gmail.com

Author of the dictionary: Nino Karosanidze
